title: Old Testament Gospel Doctrine Teacher's Manual
description: (quote on p. v)"I hope that you [studying the scriptures] will become something far more enjoyable than a duty; that, rather, it will become a love affair with the word of God. I promise you that as you read, your minds will be enlightened and your spirits will be lifted." Gordon B. Hinckley
author: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
